This made me smile and chuckle and I love it. You can create a web page where the content of the page is encoded into the URL. What an interesting way to create content that lives, well, nowhere! You could do [some fun things](https://itty.bitty.site/#itty_bitty_sites_link/?XQAAAAIUAQAAAAAAAAAqGgknZBnPpvshEOXcR709setpq3Dyo6Uc6XE7WO93QffRqtxmZZRTDPmWg0+MV0EJX4h+bb16cfGPw1UYTeTi/ltlaDtWUNIKxwcKVYrUUSLytA12fQi9+TsrTM1qn96oNUe0UYrsxe1ZsNUaWrV77/B0hEG5KiPgsJ5axgh6hJwO3o66lwhcgqka6lyIM5atjTU99DdndTQvKJz4sIEcFxrxYMktYZmt/9xPsI5+8ZgHekbfIZjz9LtXFoGuVDJZ/tTz0pBhogtp/5/PoQA=) with this! üëè
